show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: America: Exceptional(ly) Stupid
content:
Which other country regularly shuts down pieces of its government because its politicians can’t stop bickering and… blathering on about the same thing over and over again?
John Kerry says Americans have the right to be stupid.
Uh huh.
All the while, the president announces to the world how “exceptional” America is.
Let’s just open the box here and see what’s inside, shall we?
Warning: it’s not a pretty picture.
The horrendously stupid transfer of assets to Afghanistan and Iraq, all of which have to be trucked out again at untold expense.
How exceptional!
What is really behind the “government shutdown”.
An overview of what remains ‘open’.
Not much has been “shut down”… More on the necessity of leaving the United States.
How schools teach conformity and suppress critical thinking.
The Austrian School of Economics as my primary influence.
Wal-Mart trying to reduce its bloated inventory ahead of Christmas.
